About The Company

Singhal Group of Industries was established in 2000 to bridge the gap between the supply and demand of Sponge Iron & Steel. Our goal is to become a leading manufacturer in the steel-making industry. We have achieved this by setting up Integrated Steel Plants in phases, which include Sponge Iron Plants, Induction Furnaces, Rolling Mills, Ferro Alloys Plants, Power Plants, and producing products like Wire Rods, TMT Bars, HB Wires, MS Strips, MS Pipes, and more.

Singhal Subsidiaries 

With external ratings of CARE A+ Stable for the long term and Care A1 for the short term, our companies continue to lead the industry.
